EmailTemplate.name: Received IST Email
EmailTemplate.subject: E-mail sent with subject "Your Salesforce opportunity has been reviewed by IST"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Receiving_User.FirstName},
You are receiving this email as you received 1 or more emails from Salesforce.com earlier today in error. This is only for any emails with the Subject line of "Your Salesforce Opportunity has been reviewed by IST" AND that were sent from Matt Santy. You can ignore these email(s) as they pertain to an Opportunity that was reviewed in the past. Apologies for any confusion.
Thanks,
Salesforce CRM Support
